# humanize-url

> Humanize a URL: `https://sindresorhus.com` → `sindresorhus.com`


## Install

```
$ npm install humanize-url
```


## Usage

```js
const humanizeUrl = require('humanize-url');

humanizeUrl('https://www.sindresorhus.com/');
//=> 'sindresorhus.com'
```
